sentences.en: A register indicated the number of people who had gone through.
sentences.cn: 记录器上显示出经过的人数.

sentences.en: All visitors should register with the British Embassy.
sentences.cn: 所有游客都必须到英国大使馆登记。

sentences.en: Each class has a register of 50 students.
Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.cn: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.en: He checked the register. There was money in the till.
sentences.cn: 他查看了一下收银机的抽屉，里面有钱。

sentences.en: He signed the register at the hotel.
sentences.cn: 他在酒店的登记簿上签了名。

sentences.en: He told me he was married but I'm afraid it didn't register.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我他已经结婚了,不过我想当时我并未把这事记在心上.

sentences.en: He was looking over a hotel register.
sentences.cn: 他正在仔细检查旅馆住宿登记表.

sentences.en: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.cn: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

sentences.en: It will only register on sophisticated X-ray equipment.
sentences.cn: 只有精密的X射线仪器才能显示出来。

sentences.en: Many students are not on the electoral register.
sentences.cn: 很多学生不在选民名册中。

sentences.en: Please list your name in the attendance register.
sentences.cn: 请在点名册上登记你的名字.

sentences.en: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.cn: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.en: She was ringing up her sale on an ancient cash register.
sentences.cn: 她正用一台老掉牙的收银机记账。

sentences.en: The sound was so familiar that she didn't register it.
sentences.cn: 这个声音如此耳熟，她根本没怎么留意。

sentences.en: The tanker is registered in Rotterdam.
sentences.cn: 这艘油轮是在鹿特丹登记的。

sentences.en: They were married on 7 April 1927 at Paddington Register Office.
sentences.cn: 他们于1927年4月7日在帕丁顿登记处注册结婚。

sentences.en: We learned how to create and register a new web page.
sentences.cn: 我们学会了新网页的制作和注册方法。

sentences.en: What I said sometimes didn't register in her brain.
sentences.cn: 有时我说的话她根本没听进去。

words.tran_cn: 注册的；记名的；登记过的；（家畜等）附有血统证明的
登记员；注册主任；专科住院医师
注册；登记处；挂号处；船舶的国籍
登记；[专利]注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出

phrases.tran_cn: 公司登记册；公司会议记录簿
控制寄存器；控制暂存器
[英]（办理世俗结婚手续或出生、死亡等登记的）户籍登记处
n. 现金收支票据纸；注册文件；划线记录纸

trans.tran_cn: 登记本，音域，语域，调风口
trans.tran_en: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list

trans.tran_cn: 登记，给…注册，显示，表示，流露，引起注意，把…挂号邮寄
trans.tran_en: to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list
an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

trans.tran_cn: 给…注册，登记；显示，指示，自动记下；表达，流露；注意到，记住；挂号邮寄，托运
trans.tran_en: to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list
